ing: 1/2 cup ice cubes, or as desired
des: "Mouth-watering nutritious mocktail with the power of coconut water and watermelon. Garnish with an orange twist, watermelon wedge, and grapes with two blending straws."
ins:
Blend coconut water, watermelon, and stevia together in a blender until smooth.
Fill a cocktail shaker with ice; add watermelon mixture. Cover shaker and shake until chilled; pour into a poco grande glass.
